Reference

Data

ala_occurrences()

Occurrence records

ala_taxonomy()

Search taxonomic trees

ala_counts()

Count of ALA records

ala_species()

Species lists

ala_media()

Images, sounds and videos

Filter

select_taxa()

Taxon information

select_filters()

Select filters to narrow down occurrence queries

select_locations()

Build a WKT string from an sf spatial object or verify an existing WKT

select_columns()

Specify columns for occurrence download

Lookup

search_fields()

Query layers, fields or assertions by free text search

find_field_values()

List valid options for a categorical field

find_profiles()

Data quality profiles

find_profile_attributes()

Get data filters for a specified data quality profile

find_reasons()

List valid download reasons

find_atlases()

List supported Living Atlases

Cache management

find_cached_files()

List previously cached files

clear_cached_files()

Clear previously cached files

Help

galah_config()

Get or set configuration options that control galah behaviour

ala_citation()

Generate a citation for occurrence data
